presentationTable.name: More Office Objects
presentationTable.description:
->
This folder contains additional Office attributes.

presentationColumns.name: Office Key
presentationColumns.description: Office Key is an integer that uniquely identifies each record in the Offices dimension table.

presentationColumns.name: Dept Key
presentationColumns.description: Surrogate key for the Department objects.

presentationColumns.name: Org Key
presentationColumns.description: Surrogate key for the Organization objects.

presentationColumns.name: Company Key
presentationColumns.description: Surrogate key for the Company objects.

presentationColumns.name: Office Sequence
presentationColumns.description: This column returns the Office sequence from the Offices Dimension, the office sequence is used to logically sort the Office object values.
